item.title: About
item.description: I’ve been designing and developing digital products and entertainment experiences for a long time, coming up on almost (omg) three decades now. What I love is leading and working closely with teams of wickedly intelligent designers and partners, all of us obsessed with creating outstanding customer experiences. Over the course of my career, I’ve worked on so many interesting things with so many interesting people, it’s a bit wild to look back and reflect.
